com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class GameInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.GameInstance

  • public class GameInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    A container for information about a GameInstance for use with the App Inventor game framework.

    • Field Summary

      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> messageTimes

      GameInstance(java.lang.String instanceId)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameInstance

        public GameInstance(java.lang.String instanceId)
        A GameInstance contains the most recent values for the leader and players of a particular game instance. This object is also used to keep track of the most recent time that a particular message type was retrieved from the server.
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The unique String that identifies this instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstanceId

        public java.lang.String getInstanceId()
        Return the instance id of this instance.
        Returns:
        the instance id.

      • getLeader

        public java.lang.String getLeader()
        Return the current leader of this instance.
        Returns:
        The email address of the current leader.

      • setLeader

        public void setLeader(java.lang.String leader)
        Sets the leader of this instance.
        Parameters:
        leader - The email address of the new leader.

      • setPlayers

        public PlayerListDelta setPlayers(java.util.List<java.lang.String> newPlayersList)
        Sets the players of this instances to currentPlayersList. Compares the current players list with the new one and returns a delta to the caller.
        Parameters:
        newPlayersList - All players currently in the instance.
        Returns:
        PlayersListDelta.NO_CHANGE if there is no change in membership. Otherwise returns a PlayersListDelta with the appropriate player lists.

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPlayers()
        Return the list of players currently in this instance.
        Returns:
        A list of the players in the instance.

      • getMessageTime

        public java.lang.String getMessageTime(java.lang.String type)
        Return the most recently put time string for this type. This should represent the creation time of the most recently received message of the specified type and can be used to filter available messages to find those that have not been received.
        Parameters:
        type - The message type.
        Returns:
        The most recently put value for this type.

      • putMessageTime

        public void putMessageTime(java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.String time)
        Puts a new time string for the specified message type. The string should be some value that can be understood by its eventual consumer. It is left as a string here to remove the need to convert back and forth from DateTime objects when dealing with web services.
        Parameters:
        type - The message type.
        time - A string representing the time the message was created.
